ygData.subject: Wuest Website

ygData.messageBody:
I am planning on starting a Quest Website and would like the help of this List. I fyou know of a quest of any kind please let me know about it. I just need the basics. Just give the town and a btief description of what the quest is about.you can go into more detail if you would like. My main goal is to put everything in the form of a story that tells of the quest but does not give away the information ro badly. (kind of like my msg on the testament of vanear.)

Thanks
Mushin
